title: Time To Move Into West Chester, Lovely Town.
description:
Welcome to this beautiful townhome in desirable Knolls of Birmingham! Looking for maintenance free living with scenic walking trails, a real pond, pool and tennis and pickleball courts? How about snow shoveled up to your front door and garage? Complete lawn and landscaping care? Located in award winning Unionville-Chadds Ford Schools including Blue Ribbon Chadds Ford Elementary, this maintenance free 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath home has been beautifully updated and improved throughout. The main level living space includes a spacious light filled living room with full size gas burning fireplace, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, many windows, an adjacent dining area all overlooking a scenic large rear yard area with woods and open space. The rear facing deck offers privacy and peace as you enjoy the park like setting and sunsets. The large eat in kitchen has plenty of newer beautiful wood cabinetry, granite counters, stainless appliances, tiled backsplash and large breakfast, lunch or dinner nook. Just down the main level hall is the custom pantry, updated half bath and a mud room area perfect for show storage just inside the large 2 car garage. The second level offers a cavernous primary suite offering his & hers walk-in closets with custom closet systems, an en suite full bath with large soaking tub, tiled shower stall, large double vanity and linen closet. The second bedroom with walk in closet and full hall bath complete the second level. The third level stairs offer a skylight on the way to the 3rd bedroom which offers a full en suite bath and plenty of closet space. The lower level finished basement offers great ceiling height, full size window, second half bath and could either be a large 2nd family room, game room, home office or sleeping area in addition to the laundry and large storage area. The exterior features newer James Hardie Plank siding, new soffit and fascia, oversize gutters, roof and fabulous exterior lighting and landscaping. Truly maintenance free living at it's finest! The Knolls of Birmingham is a wonderful walking community with a paved trail system, beautiful open space, a community pool and clubhouse, private tennis/pickle ball courts and the walking trail is connected to the incredible Sandy Hollow Battlefield park and trail system adding miles of extra scenic and historic open space. It's like being on vacation all year long. This home is very efficient with very low utility costs. Knolls Of Birmingham is located in the Historic Brandywine Valley just a short drive to world class attractions such as Longwood Gardens, Winterthur, many private golf courses, swim clubs, Brandywine River Museum, and many other historical attractions. Easy access to the routes 202, 1, 322, 95 and upscale restaurants, shopping, Award winning Unionville Chadds Ford schools.
To see the home at 411 Homestead Dr. or for more information please call Jim at  show contact info
.

title: For rent 3 beds, 2 baths plus a deck
description:
Welcome to heart of Philadelphia! A condo less than 5 years old, with private FURNISHED roof deck (dining set, chase × 2, gas & charcoal grill, floor decks, turf, color changing lights, and long extension cord) as well as 3 decent size bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.
As you enter your future home, there is an entryway area, up the stairs is 1 bedroom on main floor with a full bathroom, kitchen and spacious living room. On the second floor, you will have 2nd  room and a Master bedroom and a full bathroom. Laundry and mechanical rooms are also on this floor. Each room has a closet with extra storage room in one of the bedrooms. Master bedroom has an additional tall closet with beautiful mirrors. Next up, you have a decent size roof deck with most of the essential furniture. Feel free to move them around or bring yours.
All kitchen appliances and washer/dryer are included. The unit also comes with built in speaker system in the living room as well as master bedroom and bathroom.
2 security cameras are available to monitor the front door and the street. Additionally, a Ring doorbell will be provided as well. Unit front door comes with a digital keypad/WiFi doorlock.
* please ask for video!
Walkable to Girard Avenue and many restaurants/attractions and has a walkable score of over 80. All public transportation (Broad Street Line, Market/Frankford Line, Suburban Line) are roughly a 10-15 minute walk. Buses 47 and 15 stop at the corner of the street.

and many more only under 0.7 miles radius!

title: 2-bed, 1-bath Home Features 2 Outdoor Spaces & Beautifully Modern Comf
description:
Situated on a quiet, sweet street in Washington Square West, 410 S Iseminger ticks all the boxes of trinity living. This two-bedroom, one-bathroom home features TWO outdoor spaces and has been beautifully updated for both modern comfort and historic preservation. Just through the front door, you’re greeted with a quaint living room with a well-maintained original fireplace and coat closet. Making your way downstairs, you’ll find the renovated kitchen with cellar door access to the street (for unloading groceries) and outdoor space. The kitchen has all new appliances, a new backsplash, and repointed exposed brick walls. The back patio is the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or work outside during a warm day. The first bedroom is found on the second floor of the home. Down the hall is the full bath featuring heated floors, a new toilet, and a new vanity. On the third floor of this trinity is the second bedroom with beautiful vaulted ceilings and exposed beams. Off of this bedroom is a little balcony. With two outdoor spaces, original hardwood floors, a basement for storage, central air, and close proximity to all your Center City favorites, you will LOVE living on Iseminger.
410 S Iseminger St

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

title: beautiful house
description: Rare find in Fishtown, Forbes magazine's hottest neighborhood in America. 4BR, 2BA semidetached 25' wide x 94’ with gorgeous historic detail, covered side porch and generous back and side yards. . Vestibule entry features high glaze vintage tiles, leaded glass transom and double doors which open to the main living space. Formal living room features 10’ high ceilings, reclaimed wood flooring, and a Capiz chandelier. Living room leads directly through to open dining room with recessed lighting through to the kitchen for excellent flow and entertaining space. Side door leads to the covered porch, perfect spot for outdoor dining or relaxing. Slate patio and landscaping designed in 2019. Remodeled in 2019 chef's kitchen offers raised panel cabinetry, quartz counters, farmhouse sink, stainless appliances, gas cooktop and custom made live edge wood shelving. There is a full bath with stacked laundry, stall shower and penny-tiled floor off the kitchen at the back of the house with additional screen/dog door direct access to the yard. The front staircase with Stark sisal carpet ascends to the second floor hall offering access to all three large bedrooms, with multiple bay windows for tons of sunshine, 9’ 10” high ceilings, historic long leaf yellow pine floors and architectural flourishes. Small bonus bedroom off the largest  bedroom which could also be a dressing room, nursery or office/study. Built-in organization in all closets. The main bath is chic in black and white - subway and hexagonal tiles offset the vintage soaking tub which fills the bay window and a pedestal sink and generous marble lined shower with rain head. Unfinished basement with approximately 971sq ft . Central 5ton Trane HVAC installed in 2018 Fabulous location in the heart of Fishtown just off Girard Avenue w/ easy access to the trolley, the El, and I95. all the neighborhood hot spots; no.1 restaurant in Philly Suraya, Wm Mulherin’s, Pizzeria Beddia, La Colombe, Happ’s, Fette Sau, Ekta, LMNO, Kalaya and so much more.

title: DON'T MISS OUT! 1 bedroom apartment for rent
description:
Amenities
- New Construction Apartment
- Central Air/Heat
- Security System
- Modern Tech Upgrades
- Washer and Dryer In Unit
- Ceiling Fans
- New Stainless Steel Appliances: Gas Stove/Oven, Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher and Garbage Disposal
- Breakfast Bar/ Countertop Seating
- Brand New Subway Tiled Bathroom w/ Rainfall Shower
- Ample Closet and Closet Space
- Vinyl Flooring
- Lots of Windows and Natural Light
- Walk-In Closet
- Large Roof Deck
- Access To Building Trash Area
Enter this third floor apartment your eyes will be immediately drawn to the natural light this apartment gets during the day. This bright and new apartment has been equipped with modern upgrades like a security system, a modern video camera door bell, Central Air and Heat, Brand New Modern Kitchen featuring Granite Countertops, fresh white cabinets, white subway tile backsplash and a stainless steel appliance package featuring: Gas Stove/Oven, Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher and Garbage Disposal.
The combined Kitchen and Living area is perfect for those who love to host guests. It has a breakfast bar enough for 3 stools, and the living area provides enough space for a comfortable sized couch and entertainment area/desk/etc....
The bathroom has been fully updated, including a white subway tiled shower and a waterfall shower. The vanity includes optimal storage for all of your bathroom necessities. In the corner of the bathroom, behind the door, there are custom shelving for your linen! In the apartment hallway you will find the stacked washer and dryer and a closet.
When you enter the large bedroom, you will instantly notice the custom walk-in closet, fitted with hanging bars and storage shelving. The bedroom is large enough for a queen sized bed, nightstand, dresser and a desk!
Make your way up the steps and on to the roof deck! On the roof deck you will be able to have City Views of the entire city! The space is large enough for an outdoor furniture set and cute lighting to set the vibe for your rooftop hangs!
The property is conveniently located at the corner of Oregon Ave and S. Smedley St. Close to Marconi Park, FDR Park, Multiple Grocery Stores, The Sports Complex, Navy Yard and so much more! The BSL subway is just a 2.5 block walk with many buses that have routes on and Around Oregon Ave! Easy access to all major highways, Walt Whitman Bridge, Center City.
